tool_description: Analyzes project documentation to extract and structure project objectives, methodologies, expected outcomes, budget requirements, and timeline components for alignment with grant criteria.

project_title.description: Title of the project to be analyzed

project_description.description: Detailed description of the project goals and activities

project_documents.description: URLs or paths to additional project documentation

budget_estimate.description: Estimated total project budget in USD

error_messages: Insufficient project information: Project description must be at least 50 characters to enable meaningful analysis.
Document access error: Unable to access one or more project documents at provided URLs.
Invalid budget format: Budget estimate must be a positive number if provided.
Invalid duration: Duration must be a positive integer representing months.
usage: Provide project_title and project_description as minimum requirements. Include project_documents, budget_estimate, and duration_months for more comprehensive analysis.

methodology_summary.description: Summary of project methodology and approach

innovation_elements.description: Novel or innovative aspects of the project
